title: A Man Went to the Motley Crue Concert . . . And Was Shocked to See Nudity???
description:
A man who went to a recent Motley Crue show has apparently never heard of Motley Crue, because he was appalled by all the nudity he saw, and might file a police report. He says, quote, "It was like Sodom and Gomorrah, it was crazy."
